name: express-open-graph-middleware
description: A middleware for detecting open-graph bots and serving them with the appropriate meta tags. Useful for Single-Page-Applications which would otherwise require Facebookbot, Twitterbot, etc. to execute client-side JavaScript, which they do not. Instead, just serve them the meta tags they care about!

scripts.pre-pull-request: yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn test

author: Mario Hoyos <mariohoyos92@gmail.com> (https://mariohoyosdev.com)
